title: Privacy Policy
body:
# Privacy Policy for {{companyName}}

**Last updated:** {{lastUpdatedISO}}

This Privacy Policy describes how {{companyName}} ("we", "us") collects, uses, and protects information in connection with {{websiteUrl}} (the "Site") and our services.

## Information We Collect

- **Contact details** you submit (e.g., name, email, project info) via forms.
- **Usage data** from analytics (page views, device info) and logs for security.
- **Cookies** and similar technologies for functionality, analytics, and advertising.

## How We Use Information

- To provide, maintain, and improve our Site and services.
- To communicate with you (support, proposals, updates).
- For analytics and advertising (see Cookie Policy) where consented/allowed.
- To protect against fraud, abuse, or violations of our Terms.

## Legal Bases (if applicable)

Where required, we rely on consent, contract necessity, and legitimate interests (e.g., Site security, service improvement).

## Sharing

We may share with service providers that help operate our business (e.g., hosting, email, analytics, advertising) under confidentiality and data protection terms. We do not sell personal information.

## International Transfers

Your data may be processed in other countries. We take steps to protect it in line with applicable laws.

## Retention

We keep information only as long as necessary for the purposes above or as required by law.

## Your Rights

Subject to law, you may request access, correction, deletion, or restriction, and withdraw consent where applicable. Contact us at **{{dpoEmail || email}}**.

## Cookies & Ads

See our **Cookie Policy** for details on cookies, ad tech, and your choices.

## Children

Our services target business users and are not directed to children under 13/16.

title: Cookie Policy
body:
# Cookie Policy

**Last updated:** `{{lastUpdatedISO}}`

This policy explains how {{companyName}} uses cookies and similar technologies on {{websiteUrl}}.

## What Are Cookies?

Cookies are small files placed on your device to store information. We use:

- **Strictly necessary** cookies — required for site functionality and security.
- **Analytics** cookies — to understand usage and improve the Site.
- **Advertising** cookies — to deliver and measure ads (if enabled/consented).

## Your Choices

You can manage cookies in our on-site banner and in your browser settings. If you disable cookies, some features may not work.

## Specific Technologies

We may use Google Analytics and Google Ads. Where required, these load only after your consent. You can withdraw consent anytime via the banner.

## Retention

Cookie lifetimes vary. We set reasonable durations and limit identifiers where possible.

## Contact

Questions? Email **`{{dpoEmail || email}}`**.
